home.overview: Exquisite 5 bedroom, 3.5 bath, 5,300 square foot DC home! Drive up the paved driveway and follow the lit pathway to the main entrance. You'll instantly notice the hardwood floors and natural/recessed lighting that brightens this home. A huge living room sits to the right of the entrance and has a wood paneled wall, stone fireplace, and floor to ceiling window with woodsy views. The other side of the entrance has a formal dining room that leads to the kitchen, equipped with dark granite countertops, double sink, tile backsplash, cherry wood cabinetry, and built-in stainless steel microwave/oven. The kitchen opens up to a unique room with wall to wall windows and two doors to access the back deck, making this space perfect for indoor/outdoor living! There are five spacious bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, including the primary suite with a walk-in closet and totally redone bathroom. This bathroom has spa-like amenities, including a dual sink vanity, granite countertop, and walk-in tile lined glass door shower with 2 heads and a bench. Steam shower that includes aromatherapy and in-wall sound system! Head downstairs for an additional living/dining space with wood paneling throughout, a brick fireplace, reading nook, and extensive built-in bookshelf library. Entertain on the 400 square foot deck outside and customize the expansive shady lawn below! Special home made to entertain guests and full of very detailed upgrades. Located in close proximity to trails, parks, top rated schools, highways, and everything DC has to offer! Buyer should verify all information.Read more
